P1 Project Requirements

Håvard, Petter, Runar, Thomas

Friday 23.09.2016

The client

Client: Ad Infinitum (that's us)

We're a group of four which wanted to create a website about something we are passionate about; building PCs. The website name will be "Build a PC". We will write about how parts work, compare parts, how to assemble it and which operating systems to consider.

Purpose and Goals

There are people out there that doesn't know how to build a PC. We think these people deserve to know how to, so our purpose it to try and teach them. Our goal is to teach everyone how to do it. The site will provide information about what the parts of the computer does, which products to consider when buying parts, how to assemble it and which OS to pick.

Audience

The website's main audience will be the people that doen't already know how to build a PC, but wants to know.

Content Organization

The site will consist of four sections plus a home page, where each section will consist of minimum one page.

Home page: Info about site, our mission and basic sitemap

Sections and pages

  1. About the parts
    1. Motherboard, CPU
    2. RAM, GPU
    3. Storage, network interface, sound card
    4. Cooling, PSU, case
    5. Accessories: Display, keyboard, mouse, headset, speakers, other
  2. About the part vendors
    1. Vendor comparison for each general class of parts
  3. About the operating systems
    1. Windows
    2. Linux
    3. Macintosh
  4. Assembling the PC
    1. Hardware
    2. Software

Site sketch

Location of Website

The website will be hosted on GitHub Pages under the subdomain build-a-pc.github.io.
